title: Unable to connect
comment: I'd love to be able to see what the other reviewers love about the app, but it finds my Classic 200 IP address and doesn't connect. Any help would be appreciated. I have an Acer tablet.

The classic will only support one network connection at a time, if you have the local app running on a pc, the classic will not accept any other connections. Please make sure the local app is not running on your network.

title: Version 2.1.2
comment: Very nice app. Interface is nice & simple. The hourly log chart is great, you can even change what the graph shows, Power, PV Voltage, Battery Voltage, Battery Current & Energy. This app is better than Midnite Solars app, quicker response & you don't need Adobe Air, HOORAY! The app is not capable of programing the unit, which is fine by me. Great work by the programmer.

title: Motorola zoom tablet netgear 763s hotspot sierra hub
comment: Awsome app really well designed guages all the right data and crisp and clear choice of colours.
Great app been using for a while now and this version is excellent

title: Great display dials
comment: This is a useful easy to use display for the classic.

title: First class
comment: This is the best there is. Would loved to edit my classic settings. Also support for whizz bang Jr readings.

title: Classic monitor
comment: Nice work on this.  If you could export data that would be bonus points.
Excellent midnite classic tool the only thing that could make it better remote networking
